Title: Controlling Bullet
Description: Pinging a Red Orb after pinging a Yellow Orb grants the Blast effect, dealing extra Fire DMG in a small area

Title: Common Combo
Description: Infernal Shot will create a burning area when fired. Attacking enemies in the burning area deals extra Fire DMG.

Title: Lotus - Dual Blades
Description: Lucia enters the burst form when a Red Orb is pinged within 4s after any 3-Ping, replacing Basic Attacks with Dual Blades.

Title: Common Combo List
Description: Attacks deal Fire DMG after Blue Orb 3-Pings. Enters "Lotus - Dual Blades" upon pinging Red Orbs afterward, dealing Burst DMG in an instant.

Title: Laser Cluster
Description: Pinging a Red Orb after any 3-Ping will cast Laser Cluster, dealing 10 instances of large area Physical DMG.

Title: Common Combo List
Description: Ping 3 Yellow Orbs to pull in enemies, then ping a Red Orb to cast Laser Cluster, dealing massive damage.

Title: Wing Shot
Description: Pinging a Yellow Orb and hitting an enemy will grant extra Energy, increasing the rate Signature Move can be cast.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Trigger Passive Skill Quiver Of Mercy 3 times with 3-Pings and collect 3 energy arrows before casting Signature Move to deal Burst Physical DMG.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Pinging 3 Blue Orbs will maximize weapon damage. Deal massive DMG with Basic Attacks afterward.

Title: EX - Slash Storm
Description: Pinging a Yellow Orb after any 3-Ping will cast EX - Slash Storm, attacking nearby enemies 8 times, dealing massive Physical DMG.

Title: Common Combo List
Description: Ping 3 Red Orbs to dash toward the target enemy, then ping a Yellow Orb to cast EX - Slash Storm and deal massive Physical DMG.

Title: Common Combo List
Description: Ping 3 Blue Orbs to pull enemies in, then ping a Yellow Orb to cast EX - Slash Storm to deal large area Physical DMG.

Title: Offence-Defense Rhythm
Description: Counterattack and launch a swordwave immediately after blocking successfully, dealing Physical DMG and increasing ATK

Title: Great Slash
Description: Pinging 3 Red Orbs will deal an extra hit when casting Heavy Slash.

Title: Artillery Tactics
Description: Karenina enters the burst form after making 3-Ping three times or casting a Signature Move. For the next 3s, her Basic Attacks will be replaced by ranged cannon shots.

Title: Artillery Tactics
Description: Karenina enters the burst form after making 3-Ping three times or casting a Signature Move. For the next 3s, her Basic Attacks will be replaced by ranged cannon shots.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Casting Signature Move after pulling enemies together when pinging a Blue Orb to deal area damage and trigger Blast Mode, dealing massive damage.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Mark enemies and enter Blast Mode after Yellow Orb 3-Pings. Triggers explosions on marked enemies in quick succession during Blast Mode, dealing Physical and Fire DMG.

Title: Fleeting Phantom
Description: Mark enemies with any 3-Ping. Attacking marked enemies with a 3-Ping will conjure a shade. Shades attack once when performing a Basic Attack.

Title: Cheap Shot
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb to move behind the enemy. Attacking an enemy from behind to trigger "Sneak Attack", increasing damage.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb to move behind the enemy. Pinging a Blue Orb to attack an enemy from behind will trigger a CRIT.

Title: Lotus - Lightning Dance
Description: Pinging a Blue Orb or Yellow Orb to mark enemies. Attacking enemies marked by Lucia has a chance to call down a lightning, hitting the target and dealing Lightning DMG.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Ping Yellow Orbs to create a lightning zone, then ping 3 Red Orbs to increase the number of extra attacks to deal massive Physical and Lightning DMG.

Title: Reversed Egretfield
Description: Hitting a marked enemy with Basic Attacks and Red Orb abilities has a chance to trigger Lightning Lure. When triggered for the 5th time, the next Lightning Lure will carry out Ex - Lightning Lure, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies and healing allies in the area.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Red Orb 3-Pings will trigger Lightning Lure.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb to pull in an enemy before pining a Blue Orb to mark it. Trigger Passive Lightning Lure with Basic Attacks afterward.

Title: Fighting Will
Description: 3-Pings grant 10 extra Energy. Gain Physical and Dark Resistance during Twin Cores.

Title: Common Combo
Description: During Signature Move, recover Energy quickly with any 3-Ping, increasing the time the Signature Move form lasts.

Title: Goddess Connection System
Description: Enhances your weapon, increasing the damage and number of hits of Basic Attacks.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Ping Blue Orbs to attract enemies. Pinging Yellow Orbs and performing Basic Attacks will increase attack rates, increasing the chance to trigger the passive "Light Penalty".

Title: Common Combo
Description: 3-Pings create Passive stacks and recover HP.

Title: Thermal System
Description: Gain Thermal Energy upon deployment based on skill levels. Casting certain skills grants Thermal Energy. All skills are enhanced when Thermal Energy is over 50%, and Fire DMG is increased in Enhanced Mode.

Title: Thermal System
Description: Blue Orb 3-Pings summon a drone. Increase Thermal Energy every time the drone attacks.

Title: Common Combo
Description: Any 3-Ping + Red Orb to unleash Enhanced Red Orbs

Title: Overclock
Description: For a short time, increase movement speed, deal Fire DMG with Basic Attacks, and lower the target's Fire Resistance after casting Signature Move.

Title: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will
Description: Upon a 3-Ping after pinging 3 Blue Orbs, enter Blade Will, turning all Signal Orbs into Special Orbs. Pinging Special Orbs will cast Swordwave.

Title: Vector Cube
Description: Cast Vector Cube upon pinging a Blue Orb and any 3-Ping. When charging, pull enemies in, increase Extra DMG Reduction, and produce a shield that lasts 7s. Deal large area DMG when charging ends.

Title: Cosmic Wave
Description: Cast Cosmic Wave upon a 3-Ping and pinging a Red Orb. Enters Enhanced Mode after the skill ends, dealing additional Dark DMG with Basic Attacks.

Title: Critical Moment
Description: Enter sniping mode after pinging 3 Red Orbs and a Blue Orb. During so, Basic Attack shoots a long-ranged lightning arrow. Exit sniping mode if 6 lightning arrows are shot or if 6 seconds pass.

Title: Critical Moment
Description: Dodging in sniping mode will lower the charge time of the next Basic Attack.

Title: Field Supplies
Description: Leaves Energy Balls after any of the following: the last hit of Basic Attack, a damaging 3-Ping skill, Signature Move, or QTE. Picking up an Energy Ball will heal all the ally characters within range and increases their Fire DMG.

Title: Field Supplies
Description: Picking up Energy Balls grants Sophia Energy and Thermal Energy. Increase Extra DMG when Thermal Energy reaches a certain level.

Title: Arclight Shield
Description: Gain a shield for 4s upon pinging a Blue Orb and any 3-Ping. The shield explodes when it ends or refreshes, dealing Lightning DMG to targets nearby.

Title: Normal Form
Description: 3-Pings increase 50% Energy and grant 1 Signature Point in normal form. Up to 2 Signature Points can be gained in normal form.

Title: Form Switch
Description: Switch to Arctic Form when using Form Switch in normal form. Gain Super Armor when switching. Rearrange Signal Orbs according to 3-Ping rules when switching with full Energy.

Title: Arctic Form
Description: Consume Energy over time in Arctic Form and increase Ice DMG when amassing Energy. Gain 1 Signature Point upon a 3-ping in Arctic Form up to 4 points.

Title: Signature - Halcyonic Blossoms
Description: The more Signature Energy gained in Arctic Form, the more damage Signature Move deals. Accumulating 4 Signature points will cast Signature - Halcyonic Blossoms, clearing all Signature Energy and returning to normal form afterward.

Title: Mass Illusion
Description: Gain Overclock points over time or by 3-Pings. Press and hold Basic Attack to unleash Core attacks when there is enough Overclock points.

Title: Mass Illusion
Description: Core attacks deal area Dark DMG and Physical DMG to surrounding targets. Performing Core Attacks consumes Overclock points and gains Energy.

Title: Instinct Unlocked
Description: Signature Move: Enter Berserk Mode, gaining Dark Energy that diminishes over time. Gain Super Armor while in Berserk Mode, and leave Berserk Mode when all Energy is consumed.

Title: Instinct Unlocked
Description: Consume Dark Energy to mitigate damage received during Berserk Mode. Dark Energy will not diminish over time in Matrix during Berserk Mode.

Title: Instinct Unlocked
Description: Use special Red, Yellow, and Blue Orbs in Berserk Mode, maximum 1 each. Any Ping is considered a 3-Ping. Recover up to 3 pinged Orb 2s after they are pinged.

Title: Surging Madness
Description: Core Passive: 3-Pings in normal form will build up Surge levels, maximum 3 levels. Gain extra Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping after having 3 Surge levels.

Title: Surging Madness
Description: Consume all Surge levels when entering Berserk Mode, gaining damage bonus during Berserk Mode based on the number of levels consumed.

Title: Charged Attack
Description: Press and hold Basic Attack to perform Charged Attack, releasing small-area or medium-area electromagnetic beam based on charge time, dealing piercing damage in a straight line.

Title: Skill Boost
Description: Rosetta can have up to 3 energy points. Upon a 3-Ping, consumes 1 energy point to gain DMG Bonus.

Title: Signature Move Boost
Description: Casting Signature Move will consume up to 2 Energy Points, granting additional Signature Move damage based on Points consumed.

Title: Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon
Description: Rosetta enters Full Burst form upon consuming all Energy Points. Press and hold Basic Attack to unleash [wide-area electromagnetic cannon]. Restore 3 Energy Points 8s after the shot.

Title: Sync Rate
Description: Qu's Sync Rate limit is 60. She will gain 10/20/30 Sync Rate based on the number of Signal Orbs pinged. The Orbs will be enhanced once she has maximum Sync Rate.

Title: Enhanced Orb
Description: Enhanced Orbs can only be pinged individually. Each time an Enhanced Orb is cleared, the 3-Ping equivalent skill will be cast along with the Concentrated Will effect. Pinging an Enhanced Orb will consume 20 Sync Rate, and Qu cannot gain Energy from it.

Title: Concentrated Will
Description: Qu consumes 5 Sync Rate every second while Concentrated Will lasts. Once her Sync Rate is reduced to 0, she will leave the Concentrated Will status and no longer enhance the Signal Orbs.

Title: Follow-Up
Description: Changyu's first Signal Orb will always be his special Follow-Up Orb. After 3-Pinging any other Signal Orbs, the Follow-Up Orb will become available for a short period.

Title: Follow-Up
Description: After tapping the Follow-Up Orb, Changyu will cast different Follow-Up Skills based on the color of the previous 3-Ping, and gain bonus Signature Move Energy.

Title: Singularity
Description: Luna has up to 60 Annihilation Pts. Each time she makes a 3-Ping, she gain 15 Annihilation Pts and the next Orb pinged is also regarded as a 3-Ping. When she has at least 15 Annihilation Pts, you may press and hold the Basic Attack button to enter the Annihilation mode.

Title: Singularity
Description: While in the Annihilation mode, Luna gains Super Armor, and up to 4 Spheres of Annihilation based on her current Annihilation Pts. She may launch the Spheres of Annihilation to deal damage and gain 10 Energy from each Sphere.

Title: Singularity
Description: Basic Attacks under the Annihilation mode cost 5 Annihilation Pts each. Luna will leave the Annihilation mode once she has 0 Annihilation Pts left, or when she is switched out of the battle.

Title: Blade Rend
Description: After a Yellow 3-Ping, make another 3-Ping of any color to enter Battle Stance, which causes Basic Attacks, Red Orb, and Yellow Orb skills to launch Swordwaves. Pinging Red Orbs in Battle Stance can also stack Data Correction effect to increase Physical DMG.

Title: Overclock Strike
Description: After any 3-ping, an Overclock Indicator in corresponding color will be added to the far right of the Orbs bar. Tap the Overclock Indicator to ping all Signal Orbs of the corresponding color and cast the Core Skill.

Title: Prototype
Description: After any 3-ping, calls upon the POD to launch homing missiles at the enemy in front and obtain POD: Shield. Once POD: Shield is fully charged, A2 is able to cast her Signature Move to activate Berserk Mode.

Title: Cold Snap
Description: After any 3-Ping, press Basic Attack within 1s to enter [Tactical Stance], and keep holding the Basic Attack button to maintain. Release the Basic Attack button to trigger [Blooming Shot].

Title: Cold Snap
Description: The backstep of [Blooming Shot] is able to evade enemy attacks. If this move successfully dodges an attack, the follow-up shot will be enhanced.

Title: Tertian
Description: Making a 3-Ping will generate a [Triad] of the same color. The next Orb pinged will generate [Tune] and trigger Chord.

Title: Tertian
Description: Chord with the same color as the [Triad] will trigger [Concerto], dealing Lightning DMG. Chord with a color different to [Triad] will trigger [Solo], increasing own damage.

Title: Frost Origin
Description: Using [Consuming any 3-Ping of shield] in non-[Frost Spirit] state, using [Frost Strike] or any 3-Ping in [Frost Strike] state can make you enter [Condensed Frost] state.

Title: Frost Origin
Description: When Chrome is attacked in [Condensed Frost] state, he will invalidate this attack and inflict Slow to the enemy.

Title: Frost Origin
Description: Chrome rank-up will upgrade the Slow Effect from triggering [Condensed Frost] to Freeze Effect and increase DMG dealt to the enemies.

Title: Shadow Prism Agglomerate
Description: No. 21 can agglomerate the Shadow Prism energy with basic attack. When the value of energy reaches 4, the next basic attack will empty the energy and form a [Twilight Matrix], beating target and dealing Dark damage.

Title: Shadow Prism Agglomerate
Description: When No. 21 casts Shadow Prism attack, the Co-Bot will release [Force Wave] to enhance attack and detonate [Twilight Matrix], dealing Extra Damage.

Title: Shadow Prism Agglomerate
Description: When No. 21 is haywire (hit, fall down), tap Dodge button to perform [Instant Dodge], remove Haywire status and release a [Twilight Matrix] to the enemy.

Title: Lightning Fall
Description: Any 3-Ping will add 1 [Electric Charge] with the next Basic Attack, max 3 stacks.

Title: Lightning Fall
Description: With [Electric Charge], press and hold Basic Attack to use [Lightning Fall] to deal wide-area Lightning DMG and reduce the target's Lightning Resistance with [Turbulence Interference].

Title: Lightning Fall
Description: Using [Lightning Fall] will spend [Electric Charges]. Spending more charges will deal more DMG>

Title: Art of Deception
Description: Tap the White Signal Orb at the 2nd/3rd/4th hit of Basic Attack to unleash different combos and gain 10/20/30 Deception Points.

Title: Art of Deception
Description: When there are enough Deception Points, tap the Signal Orb to cast skills and gain energy.

Title: Art of Deception
Description: The Matrix's enhanced orb effect now removes the cost of the next Signal Orb skill. After casting a Signature Move, gain 1 Incinerating Orb that can cast multiple incinerating orbs.

Title: Ode for Everlight
Description: Accumulate Prayer via basic attacks and pings. Upon full Prayer, double tap the Dodge button to activate Prayer, during which time you can enter two groups of Signal Orbs.

Title: Ode for Everlight
Description: Enter two groups of Signal Orbs of the same color to cast Purity Oath and deal area damage. Enter two groups of Signal Orbs of different colors to cast Chaos Oath and launch an attack that can be dodged against enemies and Liv: Empyrea.

Title: Ode for Everlight
Description: The more Signal Orbs entered in a Prayer, the more damage it will cause. In addition, every time you enter Signal Orb(s), you will deal damage against enemies, inflict Imprison on them, and restore team members' HP.

Title: Ode for Everlight
Description: Activate Prayer during a Signature Move to enter 3 groups of Signal Orb(s), which will trigger effect regardless of their color.

Title: Ode for Everlight
Description: Upgrade [Ode for Everlight] to Lv.22 to gain a random Signal Orb upon entering Prayer form.

Title: Phantasia
Description: Moving the joystick after a 3-Ping or pinging a Signature Move Special Orb will interrupt the current skill, releasing a skill variant and dealing a large amount of Dark DMG in the direction of the joystick.

Title: Phantasia
Description: Afterward, summon a phantom that will cast the interrupted skill.

Title: Snow Dragon
Description: Consume 20 Signature Energy to cast Spirit Blade: Dragon Throw, summoning and throwing Dragon Axe. While Dragon Axe is on the field, press and hold the Signature button to consume 100 Signature Energy and cast Spirit Blade: Falling Stars.

Title: Snow Dragon
Description: Pulao's Basic Attacks/Ping Attacks accumulate Dragon Force. Ping Attacks that catch Dragon Axe consume Dragon Force to unleash a Core Attack. After which, press the Basic Attack button to unleash additional Core Attacks.

Title: Snow Dragon
Description: When Dragon Axe is on the field, press the Signature button to summon it back to Pulao.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: You can tap and hold Dodge or cast Quantum Compression Shot/Flame Bombing for Nanami: Starfarer to start sliding. While this is active, you can cast the above skills with no intervals.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: Use the Signature and activate Rumbling. While this is active, Nanami: Starfarer has a Pressure slot that goes up to 200.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: When a Basic Attack hits an enemy, you can tap and hold Basic Attack to activate Bzzz. While this is active, release Basic Attack at different times to trigger Oops! Missed It! or Perfect!.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: When Oops! Missed It!/Perfect! is cast, gains 80/120 Pressure and 32/48 Signature Energy, respectively.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: When Pressure is at 200, tap and hold all the way to spend all Pressure and cast Burning Blow.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: Burning Blow: Recovers 60 Signature Energy, gains the damage multiplier of this Ironsoul Slice's Perfect!, and the Base DMG is increased by 0.25% for every Pressure. This damage is recorded after it has been tallied.

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
Description: While Rumbling is active, when Signature Energy is at max, casts Gigabyte Star Strike. When cast, additionally deals 50% of the recorded damage and then removes the recorded damage.

Title: Huntress' Command
Description: Press and hold Dodge to activate Bitterfrost Level. Once Bitterfrost Level is fully charged, release it to perform Bitter Frost that deals Ice DMG.

Title: Huntress' Command
Description: Releasing Dodge without fully charging Bitterfrost Level will result in no attacks, and Bitterfrost Level will gradually decline.

Title: Huntress' Command
Description: Getting hit while charging will deduct Dodge Gauge and performs Flash if there is enough Dodge available (CD: 1.5s).

Title: Huntress' Command
Description: With the exclusive [Isabel] memory equipped, [Bitter Frost] deals Extra DMG to enemies with [Frozen Status] from the 2-Phase Signature.

Title: Space Walk
Description: Anti-gravity System: When Karenina: Scire has a set of 3-Ping Orbs or Matrix's enhanced orb effect, press and hold Basic Attack to start charging. Karenina will gain Super Armor and DMG Reduction when charging.

Title: Space Walk
Description: While charging, 3-Ping Orbs will be consumed continuously. Each 3-Ping grants 20 Anti-gravity Energy. Up to 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs can be consumed.

Title: Space Walk
Description: When charging is complete, launches Leap Attack and leap up into the air to deal Dark DMG. After two sets of 3-Pings are consumed by charging, the Base DMG of Leap Attack will increase.

Title: Space Walk
Description: When Karenina: Scire is airborne, keep tapping Basic Attack to cast Radiant Whirlwind, dealing Dark DMG and increasing airborne time and spin speed.

Title: Space Walk
Description: Upon landing, triggers Gravity Overload, dealing Dark DMG, reducing Anti-gravity Energy, and gaining Energy.

Title: Space Walk
Description: If Karenina: Scire has no less than 20 Anti-gravity Energy, she can jump up again until her Anti-gravity Energy drops below 20.

Title: Space Walk
Description: When in the Anti-gravity status, dodges to cast Airborne Spin, pulling and knocking back enemies around her, dealing Dark DMG, and restoring 20 Anti-gravity Energy. (This effect can only be triggered once every 10s.)

Title: Space Walk
Description: When Matrix is triggered by dodging, casts Returning Repulsion, pulling and knocking back enemies around her, dealing Dark DMG, and restoring 40 Anti-gravity Energy.

Title: Space Walk
Description: Radiant Whirlwind grants Kinetic Energy. When in the Anti-gravity status, casts Starshatter Horizon and the Signature Move will deal more damage based on Kinetic Energy accumulated.

Title: Rising Key
Description: After Arca casts any 3-Ping, stop tapping Basic Attack or keep tapping it for a period of time to trigger a Combo Strike.

Title: Rising Key
Description: After a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack to charge Rising Energy. Casting Gear-Break Combo will consume the energy charged to deal extra DMG.

Title: Rising Key
Description: If Gear Level is lower than 3, the Rising Energy consumed will be converted into Rotational Speed.

Title: Rising Key
Description: If Gear Level is lower than 3 and Rising Energy is greater than Rotational Speed when triggering a Combo Strike, Gear Level will go up by 1.

Title: Rising Key
Description: At Gear Lv.3, triggering a Combo Strike will reset Gear Level and Rotational Speed to deal massive damage.

Title: Glowing Lanternlight
Description: Press and hold Dodge to trigger Luminous Realm, during which Afterglow Orbs can be pinged alongside Signal Orbs of the same color.

Title: Glowing Lanternlight
Description: Pinging orbs in Luminous Realm will accumulate Afterglow Points.

Title: Blade Abyss
Description: After performing the Phase I Signature, Stigmata will enter Sword Form, during which no Signal Orbs will be generated.

Title: Blade Abyss
Description: In Sword Form, after the 4th hit of Basic Attack or a successful dodge, pressing and holding Basic Attack triggers Sword Dance.

Title: Blade Abyss
Description: In Sword Form, performing Signature when fully charged will unleash Illuminated Abyss.

Title: Strings On Me
Description: Press and hold Basic Attack to consume Jete Points and enter the Strings On Me status to keep launching Basic Attacks.

Title: Solitary Dancer
Description: In the Strings On Me status, take hit/release Basic Attack to make Bambinata jump up and enter the Solitary Dancer status.

Title: Pas De Chat
Description: When in the Solitary Dancer status, uses Signal Orbs to cast Pas De Chat. Forgets the orbs of the same color upon a 3-Ping (will no long obtain the orbs of that color).

Title: Stringless Cage
Description: Release to remember orbs of all colors

Title: Fate Records
Description: 3-Pings outside the Hypermatrix will be recorded and then obtained again in the Hypermatrix.

Title: Realm Travel
Description: When the Hypermatrix Gauge is full, press and hold Basic Attack to trigger the Hypermatrix.

Title: Dimension Observer
Description: 3-Pings cast in the Hypermatrix will enhance Red/Yellow Orbs and grant Sight Points.

Title: Collapsing Realm
Description: In the Hypermatrix, tap Signature to trigger Collapsing Realm and deal damage based on the Sight Points consumed.

Title: Q.E.D.
Description: Consume 90 Signature Energy outside the Hypermatrix. Tap Signature to deal massive AOE Fire DMG.

Title: Color Mix: Clash of Concepts
Description: When the Secondary Color filled in is different from the Theme Color, press and hold Basic Attack to trigger it for Ayla to gain an Extra DMG Bonus.

Title: Pure Color: Theme Emphasis
Description: When the Secondary Color filled in is same to the Theme Color, press and hold Basic Attack to trigger it for Ayla to gain an Ice DMG Bonus.

Title: Color Rendering
Description: Spends 80 Signature Energy and expands the Painter's Realm.

Title: Vibrant Brushstroke
Description: In the Painter's Realm, perform a ping to trigger sliding and bumping to deal DMG. The character will spend Backup Paint and gain the 3-Ping Orbs of the same color. 3-Pings will increase the DMG of Finishing Touch.

Title: Finishing Touch
Description: Tap Signature in the Painter's Realm to trigger it.

Title: Weave: Splashing Thunder
Description: Launches 1-Phase Signature and switches to the odachi.

Title: Blading Radiance
Description: After the fourth Basic Attack/Dodge, when the blade flashes, tap Basic Attack continuously to unleash swordwaves.

Title: Resolute Blow
Description: At full Blade Aura, press and hold Dodge and then release to cast Resolute Blow, activating Selfless Stance.

Title: Unquenchable Flare
Description: With the odachi in hand and activate Selfless Stance, press and hold Basic Attack to cast Unquenchable Flare.

Title: Weave: Karmic Inferno
Description: Spends 70 Signature Energy to cast 2-Phase Signature and switch to the kodachi.

Title: Spring of Emerald Flow
Description: Any 3-Ping will give Hanying 1 Dancer Point.

Title: Dance of Emerald Flow
Description: Tap Dodge to enter the Dancer Stance with 1 Dancer Point.

Title: Dancer Stance
Description: In the Dancer Stance, Signal Orbs and Signatures will be enhanced.

Title: Fledgling Wings
Description: No. 21: Feral generates a Shield at the cost of her HP when Casting a 3-Ping Skill. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.

Title: Dusk Fluorescence
Description: After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the Predator Stance. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast Forceful Pounce to deal Lightning DMG and gain Wolfspirit Points.

Title: Forest Predator
Description: Pings extra Signal Orb(s) when Casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a Deceleration Field. Becomes invincible and slows down the enemies temporarily when the field is active.

Title: Critical Arclight
Description: With max Wolfspirit Points, press and hold Basic Attack to enter Wolfspirit Form. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack, Growling Wolfspirit will be cast with Wolfspirit Points.

Title: Sky-ripping Arcflash
Description: Casts a Signature at the cost of 110 Signature Energy

Title: Engine Vortex
Description: Press and hold Basic Attack to charge and gain Signature Energy. Getting attacked while charging will trigger Arm Block automatically.

Title: Heat Blast
Description: In the Thunder Burst Form, the rightmost single orb will be converted into an Overload Orb. The Overload Orb will be converted into a Blast Orb 2.5s later.

Title: Thunder Burst Form
Description: While in Thunder Burst Form, ping an Overload Orb or Blast Orb and then press and hold Basic Attack to launch a bonus attack and increase Signature DMG.

Title: Magnetic Blast
Description: Casts Signature at the end of the Thunder Burst Form.

Title: Echoing Twins
Description: Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo charge and enter Tactical Cipher, during which time Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by Cipher Orbs.

Title: Tactical Cipher
Description: Cecily launches attacks in the order of the Cipher Orbs entered with each attack consuming one Cipher Orb.

Title: Judgment Zone
Description: Echo enters Judgment Zone when the charge bar is full. Pinging Signal Orbs in Judgment Zone grant Splendor Points.

Title: Judgment Co-Strike
Description: At max Splendor Points, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of Cecily's Cipher Orb will trigger Judgment Co-Strike.

Title: Seafoam Mirage
Description: Lamia accumulates Fathomless Points from pings. With enough Fathomless Points, she gains Special Orbs.

Title: Ocean's Scar
Description: Ping Special Orbs in the Dark Tide Form to gain Ocean's Scar and deal damage to the enemy.

Title: Elegy of Atlantis
Description: Lamia enters the Dark Tide Form after casting a Signature.

Title: Stygian Waves
Description: If there is Ocean's Scar when Lamia is in the Dark Tide Form, press and hold Basic Attack to cast Abyssal Currents and deal damage.

Title: Reflective Nebula
Description: When BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER performs a Red/Yellow 3-Ping, receive Blue Orbs equal to the number of the orbs pinged.

Title: Entangled Heart
Description: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER can't use Blue Orbs. Casting Signature - Ethereal Star will automatically consume Blue Orbs.

Title: Limit Released
Description: Performing Red/Yellow 3-Ping will trigger Combo Strike attack, dealing Extra DMG.

Title: Composite Structure
Description: Under Patrol Mode, Watanabe can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs. When Assault Mode is activated, he can only use Red and Blaze Orbs.

Title: Engine Optimization
Description: After any 3-Ping, Watanabe gains 1 Cartridge, up to 3.

Title: Scalding Blade
Description: If Cartridge is available when Watanabe performs a Basic Attack, he consumes 1 Cartridge to shoot at the target and gain 1 Blaze Orb.

Title: Assault Mode
Description: Releases the Core Energy to activate Assault Mode, dealing Fire DMG to the enemy and reducing their Fire Resistance.

Title: Tabula Akasha
Description: Ping any Signal Orb during a 3-Ping to summon Huiyu to attack the target and activate Into the Fray.

Title: Shukra Activating Into the Fray
Description: Any 3-Ping made during Into the Fray can grant Inscription.

Title: Blade of History
Description: When Into the Fray is active and Inscription is full, press and hold Basic Attack to convert Inscription into Glyphs and cast Mountain Caller to freeze the opponent and deal damage.

Title: Enlightened Soul
Description: Starts Enthronement and deals Ice DMG to surrounding units. 3-Pings during Enthronement will grant Soul Ripple.

Title: Sovereign's Presence
Description: With the will of Kowloong, spends all Soul Ripple to deal Ice DMG to the enemy.

Title: Programming Stack
Description: Each orb pinged grants 1 Computing Point, max 9 Computing Points in total.

Title: Coupling
Description: Pressing and holding Basic Attack when there are at least 3 Computing Points will perform Coupling. Pressing and holding Basic Attack until Coupling ends will cast Overflow.

Title: Stress Integration
Description: Gains 1 Stress Orb after obtaining 9 Computing Point. Ping the Stress Orb to deal DMG. Decryptor gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction during so.

Title: Thorough Analysis
Description: Unleashes all computing power and enters Analysis Mode, dealing Dark DMG.

Title: Chordal Dissonance
Description: Exits Analysis Mode, dealing Dark DMG and detonating Hacked Mark.

Title: Main Sequence
Description: Crushes spacial dimensions , enters Main Sequence, and deals Nihil DMG.

Title: Finality
Description: Tears apart dimensional bounds at the cost of all present Signal Orbs to fill up Crescent Points, and activating Eclipse Stance and entering Finality.

Title: Shattering Moon
Description: Press and hold Basic Attack to fill up Crescent Points, casting Shattering Moon and activating Eclipse Stance.

Title: Incipient Retribution
Description: When Main Sequence is active, press and hold Basic Attack to spend Crescent Points and Eclipse Stance to cast Incipient Retribution.

Title: Lunar Downfall
Description: During Main Sequence or Finality, tap Signature to implode and obliterate space, dealing Nihil DMG.

Title: Fortify
Description: Press and hold Dodge to block attacks and accumulate Fortification Points.

Title: Enthalpy Released/Enthalpy Merged
Description: Throws out and retrieves the Energy Shield at the cost of Blue Orbs, pulling in enemies and dealing Fire DMG.

Title: Prairie Fire
Description: With at least 8 Blue Orbs, press and hold Blue Orb to deal Fire DMG and inflict Combustible.

Title: Detect and Counter
Description: Press and hold Red Orb to charge. When hit during the process, dashes forward to deal Fire DMG and converts the Fortification Points to Flash Points.

Title: Flying Sparks
Description: Launches consecutive attacks at the target. The third attack will turn all Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.

Title: Solar Reactor
Description: Thrusts the tonfas into the ground to trigger a firestorm and turn the Combustible status into the Ignition status.

Title: Breezy Purge
Description: Tap the Yellow Orb to consume at least one White Orb, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Sonority and Sharp Reserves.

Title: Bamboo Melody
Description: Tap the Red Orb to consume one White Orb, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Sonority and Sharp Reserves.

Title: Lunartone Field
Description: After pinging 6 White Orbs in Chord Mode, gain a Harmonic Orb. Pinging the Harmonic Orb activates the Lunartone Field and triggers Ethereal Symphony.

Title: Flying Leafpoint
Description: Draw the hairpin to enter Attacker Mode and launch a surprise attack, dealing Physical DMG.

Title: Jade Bloom
Description: Consume Sonority for a piercing attack, gaining Signature Energy. Spend 100 Sharp Reserves to trigger Ultima Slash.

Title: Moon Chill
Description: After consecutive dashes, deliver a finishing blow, dealing Physical DMG and exiting the Lunartone Field.

Title: Silent Snow
Description: Press and hold Red Orb or Dodge to start charging and generate Calibration.

Title: Transient Blizzard
Description: When Calibration Gauge is full, release Red Orb or Dodge to enter one of the Calibration Modes based on your charging method and gain a Backup Revolver.

Title: Flurry Blitz
Description: In the Calibration Mode, tap Red Orb to fire at the cost of 1 Condensation Projectile, dealing Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG based on the current Calibration Mode. Casting repetitively to enter the Repeater Mode.

Title: Revolver Launch / Shattered Light
Description: In Calibration Mode and when the cylinder is empty, tap Red Orb to command your drone to launch your Backup Revolver. After catching it, you can swap your revolver, refill the cylinder and renew the duration of Calibration Mode.

Title: Frosty Barrage
Description: When the cylinder is not empty in the Calibration Mode, press and hold Basic Attack to activate the hidden cylinder and spend Condensation Projectiles over time to fire, dealing Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG based on the current Calibration Mode.

Title: Signature - Superlink Flight / Destructive Wave
Description: Tap Signature to deal Ice DMG or Glaciation DMG based on the current Calibration Mode.

Title: Inscription of Icefield
Description: After casting Signature skills, leaves a Frozen Zone on the battlefield that deals Ice DMG and weakens enemies.

Title: Melting Quench
Description: Press and hold Signature to make Lucia absorb the solar power and enter the Fire Thunder Form. The Fire Thunder Form lasts 12s.

Title: Aura Blast
Description: With Max Aura Value in the Fire Thunder Form, press and hold Basic Attack to make Lucia dash continuously and slash the space open, gaining Aura Value and Signature Energy.

Title: Aura Feather
Description: After Lucia casts Aura Blast in the Fire Thunder Form, tap Basic Attack again to make her slash the space open, dealing Fire DMG.

Title: Soaring Fire
Description: In the Fire Thunder Form, tap Signature to make Lucia leap and enter the Airborne Mode.

Title: Aura Dance
Description: While airborne, press and hold Basic Attack, and then hold or tap it repetitively to make Lucia cast Aura Dance at the cost of Aura Value, dealing Fire DMG and restoring Signature Energy.

Title: Crowd Slash
Description: In the Fire Thunder Form, press and hold Signature to make Lucia slash enemies in a large area and reset the form's duration. Amplifies the damage when having the Aura Mark.

Title: Eclipse Daybreak
Description: While airborne, tap Signature to make Lucia leap to gather energy, dive at the target, explode, and land. Amplifies the damage when having the Aura Mark.

Title: Vortex Absorption
Description: Yata can only obtain Red or Yellow Orbs. Ping Red/Yellow Orb to gain Heartflow.

Title: Divine Teaching
Description: Yata can advance into a higher realm and gain Esoteric Orbs by accumulating Heartflow and enhancing herself.

Title: Esotericism: Slash
Description: Tap Esoteric Orb to cast Esotericism: Slash to gain Will and Illumination. Max 2 stacks.

Title: Night Raid
Description: With Illumination, press and hold Basic Attack to spend all Illumination and cast Night Raid, dealing damage based on the Illumination stacks.

Title: Skyward Flash
Description: Uses all energy to fire a blast shell and spends the existing Will stacks to amplified the damage.

Title: Thunderflare Storm/Comet Burst
Description: Tap the Red/Blue Orb to enter a combo. Tap the Red/Blue Orb again to cast a combo ping, granting Starlight Points.

Title: Aetherstrike
Description: With the Sword Shield in hand and equipped with at least 50 Starlight Points, tap the Yellow Orb to combine the weapons into a Shield Axe.

Title: Thunder Vortex
Description: Attacking with the Shield Axe consumes Starlight Points, granting Overload, Super Armor, and DMG Reduction.

Title: Meteoric Doom
Description: With the Sword Shield in hand and equipped with at least 100 Overload or Starlight Points, press and hold Basic Attack to cast Meteoric Doom.

Title: Starshard Slash
Description: Use the Shield Axe to slash enemies to deal massive Lightning DMG.
